content.detailedDescription:
Here is a cia made ionosphere mirror over my home that modified the weather and assaulted me with electromagnetic energy. its in quicktime format.

dennis garrett
content.summary: Ufo ionosphere mirror

content.detailedDescription: It was just about dusk, the sky was covered in broken clouds. through the breaks in the clouds i could see stars. i was just about to walk inside my home when i looked up. what i saw through the breaks in the clouds was the most spectacular thing i have ever seen. i t was like a large globe, like you would see on top of a large light pole, round, large, clear with kind of a black lines jumping airound inside, like one of those static balls that when you touch the sides of them the electricity jumps to where you move your finger. this thing was huge. it passed through the break in the clouds and disappeared for a couple of seconds. ididn't see any stars when it went back under the clouds, just black. then another globe of the same size , shape and color passed through the same break in the clouds. the two globes wern't moving very fast which gave me the chance to view the detail. there was no sound, no vibrations, nothing but a very beautiful light comming from what ever it was passing over my house. i wasn't scared as i watched it pass over head. i was just in awe. i stood there for a minute just looking up wandering what it was that i had just seen. i then went inside and told my wife what i just seen. i can still see this thing in my minds eye even today. i watch the sky alot even before this and have seen things that you normally wouldnt see but i usually put them off as high tech aircraft or metiors etc. just a few month before this sighting i was looking up on a beautiful star lit night sky. there were more stars in the sky that night than you would normally see, i was just amazed at the number of stars when i noticed a triangular patch of 5 stars moving across the sky fron north to southeast. i followed them across the sky for about a half minute untill they were out of my line of sight. they traveled across a good amount of sky in a short time till i lost sight. no sound just 5 stars in a triangle moving across the sky. my wife and kids think i'm nuts. i dont believe in ghoasts because i've never seen one. but as for machines from other worlds or wherever i know they are here.
content.summary: A large round white light with specks jumping airound inside passed through a clearing in the clouds, no sound. then another of the same passed through the same opening in the clouds. seemed to be very close,

content.detailedDescription:
You got somthing wrong with the "county entry" block. so i entered latvia to bypass the erro code.

this sighting occured in the united states, california, ventura county.

this sighting happend over aproxmately 30 years ago. it was either in 1978 or 1979--i belive it may have been 78. not important, but what i witnessed was important. i am reporting it now because of the internet and my access to high-speed downloads.

more importantly i also heard a ufo researcher on the art bell show several years ago talking about the same case--like it was very important. from his witnesse/s point/s of view they were obvserving it facing east--i realized that i was on the opposite side facing west with object fliying between us. have not been able to locate this researcher, but i'm sure someone affiliated with this site will be able to do so.

sighting...

was a resident of ventura county, ca. at the time. living in port hueneme. was driving home, west bound on the santa paula (126 freeway) when i noticed a orange/red glowing cigar-shaped object flying slowly from the north heading south.  i pulled over to the side of the road, got out of the car and watched as the object flew over a freeway overpass in the distance. object appeared about the lenght of the bridge from my vantage point.

object slowly pulsed red to a brighter shade of orange. observed flame dripping from the tail of the object. i reached inside the car and flashed my high-beams several times hoping to elicit a response from the object. there was none.

i thought at first the object was a naval jet in trouble--with the dripping flame. but i heard no jet noise. i then realize that the object was flying below the stall speed of a jet aircraft. 

the cigar shapped object continued to fly in a southerly direction towards the point mugu naval air station in the distance. remember seeing the warning lights above mugu rock (leading to the tracking station) in the distance very clearly that night. watched until the light could no-longer could be seen. 

object did not vary speed or flight path. it made a straight line out to the ocean. 

made this observation perhaps a mile or so from the highway 118 overpass. in between me and the city of ventura were west saticoy, county center (not there at the time) and the 118 los angeles avenue. i believe the object passed over the 126 freeway somewhere between the 118 bridge and west saticoy.

i only caught the tail end of the art bell interview segment--but heard the mention of ventura/saticoy and "cigar shapped" object. and that this occured in the late seventies.
content.summary: Nightime cigar shaped red/orange glowing object dripping fire

content.detailedDescription: It followed me from kentucky to california on a driving trip and torchured my genetalia and is still doing it women are using a satellite dish thats mobile to torchure people and brain wash people giving them false ailments and cancer. i have ct scans from to different hospitals and know one at homeland security or cia will help me. you can see this device appear brighter than all stars and moves down and left to right can also appear to fall out of the sky by falling and turning off its lights.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Satellite dish thats mobile and  enters earths atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: Was traveling eastbound on i-96 coming home. this event occured sunday night at about 7:45 in the evening. around mile 105, what seemed like a blue fireball flew across the sky on a downward angle from right to left. the object appeared to be disc shaped and covered in a blueish flame and tinged with yellow spots. the object was moving very fast and could not have been a plane or any other flying object i can recognize. the object moved from the right to the left and promptly vanished. i was not the only person in the vehicle when this occured and my girlfriend could surely vouch for me. i understand that exit 105 is near the lansing airport, but this object moved too fast to be a plane. the object caught both mine and my girlfriends attention immediately and we both saw the same object. after seeing the object and then seeing it vanish i remember feeling excited that i had seen something unusual.
content.summary: Eastbound on i-96, blueish disk like object covered in blue flame

content.detailedDescription: My 8 year old daughter and i were watching tv in our living room when a bright lightness appeared in the room.I thought it was just a full moon brightness,as i do not follow the table of such things.I noticed that the light moved ,not in a normal way,and went to the glass doors on our porch to see what was so bright.There was the moon,full,but much too small to be the moon.It swayed,zoomed,seemed to almost play with us to watch it for over a half hour.It was quite scary.I did become defensive,sending my daughter to bed,but this thing just kept zooming in and out of the frame of our sliding glass door frame for over an hour,it seemed to really be only about 25 feet square,in size.Whatever it was,it was certainly not the moon,a plane,or anything else i had ever seen.I heard no sound,at all,during this things entire visit.I did feel fear,as it seemed to want me to open the door for it,but i did not.Eventually,it screamed away,no sound,but a very fast ,2 seconds ? ,departure
content.summary: Perfectly round moon -very responsive,fast,scary

content.detailedDescription: i was traveling in n. georgia, on my way to blue ridge. it was late and dark. i was going around a mountain clockwise. i was near the top. to my right, thru the passenger window i noticed something that appeared to be descending. it looked like a very large modern round building. from what i can remember, it had what looked like picture windows all around it. there were lights above and below the windows. i could see there was light thru the windows. i wasn't able to stop, i was towing a large heavy trailer. at i circled the mountain, i saw it again, it still appeared to be descending. i told myself that it seemed to be moving because i was moving. a few weeks later i spoke with a friend who lives in blue ridge. i asked her about what i saw and if there was any type of building in that area that matched my description. she said no.
content.summary: Large, round. looked like a large round building. three levels of  lights all around it.

content.detailedDescription:
I have this whole thing recorded in one of my journals, so it's not from memory, it's taken from the day it happened after i wrote it down in my book.
 my brother and i were playing basketball late one summer night but while it was still quite bright out, when we noticed a small opaque(seeming) circle in the sky, perhaps the size of a dime if you held it up and squinted your eyes.  this was in the northern sky. it had a bright silvery kind of ring around it, and a really bright spot off one part of the ring.We sat down to watch it because it looked like nothing "normal" to be in the sky.After about 10 minutes , the circle broke up into 5 white glowing , smaller circles. then a yellow triangle shaped object moved down from the center of the 5 circles( kind of like all these shapes had just 'appeared' from the opaque circle) and stopped in the middle of the sky.Then a smaller yellowish-orange cicular object "came down out of " the yellow triangle shaped ufo, and the two objects moved slowly sideways together in the sky.Meanwhile 4 of the 5 glowing objects in the sky shrank to pin points and started moving all around and then disappeared.The last white circle moved slowly west in the sky and disappeared.The small yellow-orange object that appeared lastly, moved west and towards the horizon and then out of sight. lastly the yellow triangle shaped object moved straight west and stopped, moved straight down, and then disappeared. all this, and no sound at all. judging only by sight, i'd say this all happened at the most a few miles north from where we were, in the middle of the town.
 i was 17 at the time, and my brother was 16. we were both pretty excited and ran home and told our parents. they believed us right away, and said they'd wished that we'd called them from a pay phone so they could have seen it too. i have heard a lot of stories of people seeing ufos in the sky by this small northern town. myself and a friend also had another ufo sighting in the town about a year a half later.
content.summary: Sighting of multiple ufos appearing out of the sky , and gradually disappearing in multiple directions

content.detailedDescription: I am driving west on hwy.71 about halfway between bastrop and austin. i notice a dark object in the sky approaching towards me at a low altitude. i see that is has no wings,no engine, i hear no sound. it looks a little like the front end of an f-117. it has some kind of flap on the rearend. i see the flap rise up and the aircraft does the same, going up above and out of sight. i look around but see nothing. i have never seen anything like this, and think that it is a ufo. it really moved like nothing i know of can. there were a few other cars on the road, but this happened in such a short amount of time that no one else may have seen it.
content.summary: Saw what i think was a ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was driving by myself at about 2 am along highway 50 in nevada, heading west. there was a solid cloud cover, quite high.  up ahead i noticed a bright red light emerge from the cloud cover and make a half circle, disappearing back into the cloud cover. as the light entered the clouds, another brigt red light dropped down and followed the same path.  i continued to drive, watching these lights come and go for about 30 minutes.  during this time the cloud cover was lowering so that i saw less and less of the arc the two lights were consistantly following.  finally i pulled off the road and shut off the engine and got out of the car to listen.  at this point, i could only catch a glimpse of a red light at the bottom of its arc. there was no sound.  the lights were solid bright red without flashing or any other colors.  as i got back into the car i glanced to my left, south, and off over the desert i could see the faint blue glow of lights on the ground. later i saw on a map that the fallon naval air base was in the area and i concluded that the blue lights were runway lights.  one of the oddest things about these red lights was that i never seemed to get closer to them, which indicats they were either moving away from me or, more probably, were at a great distance.
content.summary: Bright red lights emerging and re-entering cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: One night in the summer of 1957 i was at the drive-in with a date.  during the movie i noticed a v-shaped set of lights, apex leading, coming from the north. there was a road behind the drive-in where cars sometimes parked to watch the movies free, but the configuration of lights was puzzeling.  i wondered if the lights were reflections on my windshield from behind us or if they were actually lights in the sky.  i stepped out of the car and watched a v of 9 lights cross above the screen, north to south, disappearing to the south.  the lights were white, not blinking and there was no other color associated with them.  no sound was heard. they were in view for approximately 3 minutes. i was surprised that they traveled from horizon to horizon in 3 to 5 minutes without making a sound.
content.summary: Triangle of lights passing north to south

content.detailedDescription: I was driving a semi-tractor west on i-180, over the illinois river on the hennepin bridge. as i approached the crest of the bridge i saw a huge pale, blood red circle with the upper left part of the circle missing to the west, north west. there is a large antenna in the same direction and it was just to the right of the antenna. i observed it for about 20-25 seconds through the front windshield. if you were looking forward you couldn't miss it. as i drove down from the bridge i entered the bottoms, a large wooded area and lost sight. the object appeared to be somewhat high in the sky, but with the trees so close and all around i couldn't see it. i said to myself, was that the moon? what is it, a cloud? it was very strange, especially since i have driven over the bridge at all hours and all seasons, and never have i seen anything like it. so i stepped on the throttle to get up to the highlands to get another look. as i climbed a big hill, when i leveled out, i saw it again out of my drivers side window, this time i only saw the top of the circle with the missing upper left part. the rest of the circle, i presume was obscured by trees. i was headed north at the time. i observed it for about 5 seconds this time, before i was back in the trees. i was driving to the quad-cities, so i stepped on it again to get to interstate 80 about 5 miles north, where the ground is flat to get another look. all the time i was looking west, and i never saw it again. when i got to the farmlands, i looked again and i never saw it. i got on i-80 west bound, i looked to the south, south west, north, northwest, and i never saw it again. i looked the whole time i drove the 50 or 60 miles. it was a starry night without any clouds in the sky. whatever i saw it was huge. it reminded me of the harvest moon. it was also higher in the sky. i know if it was the moon i should have been able to see it the 10 or 12 minutes it would take for me to get to west bound i-80. i know i saw something what it was i don't know. i am sure someone else must have seen it, because like i said it was huge, and you couldn't miss it. i can draw picture if you would like.
content.summary: Huge (really big),pale blood red circle with upper left missing (like a bite out of it.)

content.detailedDescription: I had pulled into the driveway of my rural home and was exiting the vehicle when the sound of what seemed very familar to a jet airplane engine winding down caught my attention. it was dark out and i looked up and immediately saw the object above me moving to the south. my best recollection of its appearance after all these years, and points that i am very positive about, is that i saw four small points of light at the four corners of the rectangle shape (all four lights had the same color) and a fifth point of light "detached" from the four rectangle corner-points but in the "front" of the object as it moved in a southerly direction. that fifth light was of a different color than the other four lights behind it. at the time i was aware of what the two colors were, but i have since forgotten those two specific details. the object appeared to be approximately as wide as about 50 to 100 feet and maybe 75 to 125 feet in length (these measurements apply specifically to the rectangle portion of the object) and the fifth "leading" light point was a distance from the other four that i just don't really recall now. my estimation on the measurements may be highly incorrect, but two points that i'm absolutely positive about is that the object was very, very large (in the size range of a very large house or two)and that the object was moving through the sky at a very, very, very slow speed - not a whole lot faster than that of a person walking at a fast pace. i personally am not aware of any manmade object that large and capable of flight but able to move that slowly. i really have no exact idea how far up it was but would estimate 2-300 feet, but that is only a guess, especially after all these years. i initially saw the object and was absolutely stunned by it. i could see no actual object or superstructure, just the five lights. it moves, from its initial location where i first laid eyes on it, about 100 feet and then, while directly over my home, rotates to the right from its initial due-south direction and continues in the same fashion westbound. ironically, at the time this occured i was a press photographer and had my bagged equipment in the car. i did not make an attempt to photograph it because that would have required the time necessary to retrieve the camera and a flash, put the flash on the camera, make necessary adjustments to the camera and flash for a properly exposed picture, etc. even though the object was moving extremely slowly for a manmade object, i knew that its slow speed was going to be quick enough for it to move out of sight before i could get the camera equipment ready for a hand-held flash exposure. i was so completely fascinated by what i was seeing (instinctively i knew i was seeing something extremely strange) that i did not want to take the time to avert my eyes to get the photo equipment out of the car. i then ran to the house and pounded on the front door to attract my wife's attention, all the while not taking my eyes off of the object. she came to the door in bewilderment and i pointed upward and told her to look, taking my eyes of the object just long enough to glance at her to make sure she was seeing the same object. she was seeing the same thing, with her mouth dropped in amazement, and i immediately returned my gaze to the object and we both watched it continue westbound until it flew over a tree line and out of sight. the entire episode lasted no more than about three to four minutes. at this point, i do not recall if the loud jet engine-like noise continued throughout the entire episode or if at some point it died out or just what was occurring audibally. i truly have no idea what the object was, but based on the facts presented above, and just a deeply instinctive feeling that it was not a "normal" machine, i have elected to provide this report to mufon.
content.summary: A very large rectangle-shaped object that had five lights flew extremely slowly over my home and then left area.

content.detailedDescription: My sister was just getting home and was outside in the driveway.  she saw an object to the west wich barely cleared the mountain, about a half mile away.  it was large and she could make out yellow lights running horizontally across the object.  it got closer and she said it suddenly turned on a bright white light, kind of like a headlight.  it was on for just a little bit and it then turned off all lights altogether.  she could still see the path of it when it got about 200 yards from our house.  she said it was moving very slowly. it was just above the treeline and she could easily see the shape of the object.  she described it as a dark round object that was about 8 feet tall and fairly large.  it got a little ways past our house and she said it just vanished.  i beleive my sister to be very credible.
content.summary: Disc with yellow lights around rim and bright white searchlight
Six bright flashing lights in a large circle

content.detailedDescription: I saw a blinking disc then it just dissapeared
content.summary: Blinking disc

content.detailedDescription: A row of amber lights, one appearing and burning out as the next one appeared, totalling four.Three of us saw this occur twice, in the same area, but in a different. down the road( we were driving) it happened again, but only two and three lights. they were not flares or fireworks- in a straight line, appearing and burning out. i am a news reporter and posted a blog on our web site (www.Statesboroherald.Net) and people replied, stating they saw this as well. a woman from screven county called after seeing this blog and told me a very interesting encounter her and her son had with the same kind of lights, but forming in lines and a v-shaped, and appearing to form a light show.
content.summary: A row of amber light,one appearing & burning out as the next one appeared totalling 4

content.detailedDescription: I was about 8 years old in 1972 living in a 4 family flat in highland park mi on glendale a new family had moved in from texas and i became friend with a girl my age i slept over that night, about sometime in the early a.M. i awakend to use the rest room and got out of bed the rest room was located on the right side of the room i was sleeping in at the end of the hall and the hall was shaped like in l. i heard a noise a door moving i walked to the long side of the hall to see who was awake with me the light shinning from the bathroom located on my right side allowed me to see what i thought was a small child holding onto a door knob peering out from behind the door i could see his sillouhette and i thought wow! he must be hungry he looked skinny so i took a step closer blinking my eyes as to clear up my sleepy vision and as my vision became more clear i turned my head to the left and it mimicked me and that's when i saw the eye it was large and black so i turned my head to the right and it mimmicked me again and the mouth and nose tiny slits for a nose and a dimple for a mouth appeared from behind the door and then i noticed the 3long fingers holding the door knob and it had no clothes on i could only see its one shoulder and its skin although dark in hall with only the light from the rest room appeared to be grey a dark grey ----i took a deep breath and urinated on a oldfshioned wax floor the kind that leave water spots the urine ran down my left leg and i fainted i woke the next morning and remember i urinated on the floor but there was no evidence and i didn't know why i would do that my underware were bright white almost glowing and i was back in the bed, no urine in the bed -- i felt no need to tell my mom or my friend that i urinated in the hall there was no proof the wax floor was not dammaged and my undies were better than new and so smell i did not know why i did it, it was like a dream-- well fast forward to 1986 14 years later--time life  magazine advertised a give-a-way book aliens are they really out there and flashed a picture of the alien and i was 8years old again stading in the hall re-living eveything over again like a time warp - they are here they have been here for years they could restore the floor because there was an example to go by but they could not restore by undies because they did not know what they looked like before i soiled them they were glowing white that next morning- for two weeks i could not walk that year i forgot about that a relative told me i believe there is a chip in my leg may they hit an important nerve inserting it and there was deep inditation there for some time i gained so much weight its hard to see now - i'm not crazy.- this happened to me and i will not go on acting as if it did not - there is more to the story the family i was visiting came from texas from a farm and after many years i saw them again and told them my story and they confirmed it to be true a family member commited suicide as a result of watching the alien move about the residence quite fequently in the evenings he was born after i lost touch with my friend it was a younger brother to her he was dead before i saw her again - they did not beleive him so he killed himself i wish i could have been there because i saw the alien i would have beleived him.
content.summary: It was a alien

content.detailedDescription: First saw three lights just above trees, one fading,another appearing, the the third one appearing and disappearing. drove about 5 more mile toward home, saw one light again and went to get my son from house about 1/2 mile away. went back to the cotton field, stood around and explained to my son what i saw and exactly where is was located. both of us were looking around when it appeared again, but as soon as my son turned to look at it , it was gone again. this was my third sighting. at that time, my son thought i was crazy, but was willing to hang around for 5 more minutes. five minutes passed, and disappointed i instructed my son to get in the car.Once i tured(sic) around to get in the car, it appeared again, but this time it lit up the sky! four or five lights flashed one by one to the left, then four or five to the right(all amber colored), the a "v" shape appeared with the same color lights and shape, but all lights never shining at the same time. it disaapeared just like that! it was amazing and was huge!
content.summary: 3 lights in field,1 fading,another appearing the 3rd appeared & disappearing
Metalic spherical object floating just below clouds on a rainy day.
my 12 yr. old daughter and i saw what we took as a meteor, but slow, green and burning particles streaming off.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Actually, i had just stepped outside to the back yard sometime after 1:30pm, nice sunny day, blue skies, not a cloud in site but the temp somewhat cool. looking around as usual i noticed this white object moving in the distance from the nw, which at first i thought it was merely a plane (it was still quite aways off) and i really didn't think much of it at first. but as it drew closer overhead i could tell it wasn't a plane, it appeared to be round and very, very bright and high up.  the speed in which it were traveling was about the pace of a passenger aircraft at that altitude.  i ran in grabbed my camera off the dining room table where i normally kept it when i'm at home.  replaced the 38mm lens with the 300mm lens and start snapping shot after shots.  i called for connie,(my wife who was indoors and a neighbor who were doing some work next door). my wife was the only one who was able to witness this object, the neighbors view was obstructed by trees on both our property. at first i didn't know if i wanted still shot or video footage, my video equipment was in my truck at the time so i didn't want to waste any time messing around.  i started out taking pictures holding the camera in hand but because i was shaking somwhat i ran in and grabbed the camera/video tripod which took only seconds to setup.  i was then able to take these amazing and remarkable shots before i lost site of it in the ssw (sun light). not until after i was able to download these imagines of this object that the true shape was revealed. 
   see my website at: www.Howconcreation1.Photosite.Com for more photos. in fact another incident happened in nov. 2006 while taking a picture of a helicopter flying over.
content.summary: Wow and amazing...

content.detailedDescription: First off let me start by saying that i have observed this object at least 5 times, the first time was dec.31, 2006. i was leaving a friends house, which is in the middle of town, around 6:20 pm. i was headed west towards my home when i looked up in the sky and saw a very large object that appeared to be hovering over neighborhood which was about 30 street blocks from where i was. it was still daylight, i was on the phone with a friend who could also see the object. i was very interested in trying to see exactly what it was so i continued west about 60 blocks from where i first saw the object. that was when i realized that the object was not hovering over a neighborhood. the town i stay in isnt very big, everything is pretty close together, so once you past all the houses and stores, you are pretty much in the country(open fields, trees,etc). i drove south until i was at the very edge of the town. i could see the object very clearly hovering over a field where i believe there may be cows. i could have easily gotten a much closer look if i would have gone down this country road, but it was dark by then and for some reason i was getting the feeling that what ever was in this craft was watching me. so i pulled over at this retirement home and begin recording it with my cell phone. i would have to say just guessing, that the size of the object was about 2-3 times larger than a commercial airliner. it was saucer shaped with very bright blue and white lights around it, spinning. the object appeared to change shapes a couple of times, and a very bright white light, which was on the bottom of it, was circling around it kindof lke some type of search light or something. the object simply faded out and reappeared like miles away, and then disappeared. since then i've seen the same object about 4 more times, and all around the same time in the day, around 6:30 pm. and it always seems to be visible for about 30-40 minutes. i have video from three of those sightings. thank you for giving me the opportunity to share my story.
content.summary: Stationary, rotating, lights around the edges, appears to change shapes

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting to see if there were any reports about what i observed, but i haven't heard of any yet, so i guess i have to be the one to report it. 

i was driving up main st in lake placid and saw a strange looking object  through my windshield. i parked alongside the street and got out of my vehicle to watch. i saw a large black, triangular shaped object crossing the sky below the clouds heading from south to north. when i first saw it, i would estimate it to be about 1500 to 2000 feet high. as it moved northward it steadily gained altitude until it passed through the clouds which were very high.  at first i thought it was a hang glider or a large kite but determined that it wasn't either as it continued to rise as it traveled northward.  on two occasions, as it was moving, another similar black triangular shaped object, appearing a little smaller and less distinct, seperated from the first and moved away about twice the distance as the width of the first object. it did a little manuvering on its own then slowly returned to and became part of the original object again.  there was no apparent sound and no vapor trails (which would be likely if it was a jet as the air temp was around zero degrees)  this thing just did not move, act or look like anything i have ever seen in the air. while watching it, i called a friend in a different location in lake placid and she was able to see it from a different vantage point. she said she saw a small light on it, but i did not.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw a large black object crossing the sky below the clouds heading from south to north.  at first i thought it was a hang glider but as it was moving, it slowly continueed to clime

content.detailedDescription: i believe i was 12 yrs old when on about 10-15-68 ten pm a friend and i were sitting in his parents car passing time by the river when i saw a object come out from way up in the sky. it came down the side of this hill down to the river just maybe 2 feet off the water and was moving around in short little jumps inside a confind area. fast movements and would stay still also for 2 to 5,6, seconds then move again. it moved back up the hill like it was back tracking a bit then shot back up in the sky in way less than a second and was as small as the stars. my friend an i kept our eyes on it and watched it moving around up there. when it stood still it was so small it looked like any other star. after a about 20 seconds it came back down just as fast, and stopped above the water again. it was moving around like before and came moving up towards where we were at. my friend an i got out of the car an began walking towards it. it was no farther away than 200 feet. at this time at eye level.I was hanging on to him and him me we were telling each other to go get your parents but neither of us would go. we walked closer to it as it hovered and was moving around. this time when we moved toward it, it started to come at us so we both stopped. we must have been 150 feet away from it. there were lights going around in a circle on the outside of it like a billboard sign. it was disc shaped an about thirty feet in dia. it did not make any sound at all. it then started to go back up the hill somewhat, then shot up and out like a 45 degree angle way out in the sky , stopped for a sec then shot straight up from there. it was very far up this time an looked like a very small star but you could still see it very easy. it started moving south, southeast, slowly then picked up quickly then plink it was gone. it moved so fast it just left a streak. i could see it for 25 to 30 miles cause it was so far up, maybe futher.It ate up that distance in maybe 1 tenth of a second if it took it that long. my friend and i just looked at each other an couldn't believe it.  it was clear that night no moon no wind no clouds. there was a small airport nearby and during the day i would always see small airplanes making their final approach to go and land. rarley would you see airplanes at night around there.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Saw coming out of the sky hovering in front of us, shot back up, then came down again in same place , moved around some more then left

content.detailedDescription:
While my bassist paulo and i were walking to our friend mannys house on gregory dr. val verde neighborhood(will not put exact adress because for our own safety) at exactly 2:45pm. we noticed mannys neighbors were pointing at the sky above. we both looked towards the area they were pointing at,we were astonished by a silver unidentified flying object. paulo and i rushed to mannys house. as we rushed in screaming "manny look a ufo!! a ufo outside in the sky!!" his family ran to the door looked outside and just stayed looking at the ufo as it moved with so much intelligence from one spot to another then back where it was at first. 
	then we notice that this ufo had two small sphere rotating around it. then mannys neighbors yelled "look over there!! over there!! there is a giant black one over there!!!!" just across the silver ufo. as we all looked at the black ufo it started to leave west towards del rio, then vanished. the silver ufo remained at the same spot. as manny tryed to take a picture of this ufo. 
	suddenly, the ufo began to move slowly and just a little closer to land. then moved back higher into the sky. all of a sudden the silver flying object left the area going north with incredible high speed(this defenetly wasnt no weather balloon). this scenario lasted 15 or 20 minutes. manny, mannys brother ray, paulo and i got in mannys truck and tryed following the ufo going toward rocksprings. but, the ufo was not seen again. myself being a longtime ufo & extraterrestrial life believer couldn't feel any happier then ever. my most desired perseverance came true.
content.summary: Two unidentified flying objects in the del rio sky

content.detailedDescription: I was jogging with a female friend when i notice an object(two sphere's flying together as if they hooked end to end together in the middle) flying at a high rate of speed above the horizen.  no sound was noted.  the object then turned flying towards me and my friend staying just above the pine trees.  we both stop running when the object started flying towards us.  the object two sphere's glowed at approx 60 watt blub.  as we continued watching the object it came to hover over a pine tree about 20 yds away.  it hovered level to the ground above the pine tree making no sound.  i looked at my freind and said "do you see what i see".  we both were fixed as if a statue. as we watched the object it tilted down towards us like pointing a light on us.  then the front sphere incresed in brightness to about 125 watts of light.  the rear sphere remained at about 60watts.  for about 3-5 sec the brighter light remained pointed at us.  then the front sphere decresed back to about 60 watt light intensity. then the object rotated 180 degrees pointing toward the sky and in a split second was gone out of sight. again no sound was made by the object.
content.summary: I was jogging with a friend saw two spheres flying on the horizen very fast and no sound turned and hovered over pine tree it pionted toward us front sphere became bright 3-5 sec then back to normal turned up toward sky and was gone in a split second
2 police officers spot chevron shaped object over busy shopping area

content.detailedDescription: I was on my home from work -a correction officer at the time-i was driveing -along route 1oo in westchester county  along a reservoir-when i spotted a red light-thought nothing of it -as i look at it again-was red and white-thought it was a plane -but the more i look up it saw it taking shape was oval -i stop my car to get a better look at it !!I was not alone ,the other person also a correction officer was scared -he said dont stop-i did -told him get out this is something u will never see . so close-i ran across the road-was alone ;the craft came in like a falling leaf .Quiet-bright red and white lights-the craft stop over the water i say 20 ft above it-and then in flash shot across the reservoir so fast gone in a second-i was about to leave -when i saw clouds or smoke comming down - a 2-craft shape like a missle came down very fast in the same spot were the other was -for about 10 seconds was there-then it shot straight up in a flash too. this ufo was quiet too with a red glow- have to say ,what were they up too - maybe they noticed me and aborted there landing ???
content.summary: There were 2 ufos
